data.native: A close-up photography shot of a cute cat with wide, soulful eyes and soft, tufted ears. The feline's curious expression is the focal point, with every delicate whisker and fine hair rendered in sharp detail against the soft light. Behind the subject, the environment melts into a beautiful shallow (bokeh), where distant elements transform into soft, creamy orbs of color that ensure all attention remains on the cat's endearing face. The natural lighting catches the texture of its fur, creating a gentle warmth that enhances the overall charm of the portrait

preservedDetails: holding a blue cute mascot phone case
no beauty filters or over-smoothed skin
no logos, brand names, or readable UI text
originally pink elements replaced with blue
photography settings: f/1.8, ISO 100, shutter speed 0.01s, exposure compensation -0.3EV

core.subject: A 25-year-old East Asian woman taking a mirror selfie in an otaku-style computer corner. She has a slim body with a defined waist and natural proportions, light neutral skin tone, and waist-length straight medium brown hair with slightly curled ends. She is standing in a slight contrapposto pose, holding a smartphone in front of her face (identity hidden) with her right hand, and her left arm naturally hanging down. Her torso is leaning slightly back, exposing her waist and abdomen. She's wearing a light blue cropped knit cardigan (top two buttons fastened, a blue French-style bra faintly visible), denim ultra-short shorts with a blue satin ribbon bow on each side of the hips, and blue and white horizontal striped over-the-knee socks. A blue cute mascot phone case is visible. The bedroom computer corner is seen through a wall-mounted mirror, featuring a white desk, a single monitor showing a soft blue wallpaper, a mechanical keyboard with white keycaps on a blue desk mat, a mouse on a small blue mouse pad, a PC tower with blue case lighting, three anime figures, a poster of a pagoda, a cat-shaped desk lamp with blue accents, a transparent glass of water, and a tall green leafy plant by the window. All originally pink elements are replaced with blue tones (baby blue to sky blue/periwinkle blue). Shot with a smartphone rear camera via the mirror, equivalent focal length 26mm, focus on the torso and shorts in the mirror image, natural smartphone deep depth of field, background clearly visible with no artificial blur. Crop from the top of the head to mid-thigh, including the desk, monitor, PC tower, and plant in the frame. Slightly high angle from the mirror’s point of view, subject centered, avoiding wide-angle edge distortion. No pink/magenta, beauty filters, over-smoothed skin, exaggerated or distorted anatomy, NSFW elements, logos, brand names, or readable user interface text, fake portrait-mode blur, or CGI/illustration feel. Daylight coming from a large window on the left side, through sheer curtains, soft diffused light, white balance 5200K. Aperture f/1.8, ISO 100, shutter speed 0.01s, exposure compensation -0.3EV. Aspect ratio 1:1.

data.native:
Realistic Mirror Selfie Photography of a 25-year-old East Asian woman with a slim body, defined waist, and natural proportions, captured in the reflection of a wall-mounted mirror within a detailed otaku-style computer corner. She stands in a slight contrapposto pose, her torso leaning back slightly to accentuate her silhouette, while her waist-length straight medium brown hair with slightly curled ends falls gracefully over her shoulders. She is dressed in a light blue cropped knit cardigan with the top two buttons fastened, allowing a blue French-style bra to be faintly visible, paired with denim ultra-short shorts featuring blue satin ribbon bows on the hips and blue and white horizontal striped over-the-knee socks. 

The otaku-style computer corner behind her is a curated blue-themed sanctuary, featuring a white desk with a mechanical keyboard, a blue desk mat, and a monitor glowing with a soft blue wallpaper. A PC tower with blue case lighting sits near anime figures, a pagoda poster, and a cat-shaped desk lamp, while a tall green leafy plant by the window adds a touch of organic texture. Soft, diffused daylight filters through sheer curtains from the left, casting a natural 5200K glow across the scene. 

The image is rendered with a natural smartphone deep depth of field, ensuring that both the subject and the intricate details of the room remain sharp and clear without any artificial blur. Shot from a slightly high angle at a 26mm equivalent focal length, the composition is centered and realistic, avoiding any wide-angle distortion or over-smoothed skin textures. Every element, from the blue mascot phone case to the glass of water on the desk, contributes to this authentic Realistic Mirror Selfie Photography

data.native: A cinematic, monochrome photography portrait of a bearded Western woman with long blonde hair, her underlying facial structure and bone architecture faithfully adapted from the provided photo with a 0.8 resemblance to the original subject's proportions. Standing on a nocturnal city street, she is framed by a shallow (bokeh) that melts the urban background into soft, luminous orbs of light. The interplay of shadow and silvery highlights emphasizes the texture of her blonde tresses and the unique character of her beard, while the structural essence of the reference image provides a grounded, striking presence within this black-and-white composition
